title: The Fyrelit Tragedy
description: Zarkora ... A city lost to darkness. But everything that is lost, eventually must come to light. A decade after the loss of their parents, Neleik and Ervine Fyrelit, two poor farm boys witness the kidnapping of their little sister, Sky. The Fyrelit brothers set off on a journey into darkness, unlocking secrets and revealing an unknown past beyond their imaginations. They will meet loyal companions, face against powerful enemies, in a world that is unknown to them in hope of rescuing their sister.
author: Nicholas Lochel
